title: Which song was a number one hit in most countries worldwide? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would guess Volare or Nel blu depinto di blu by Domenico Modugno. This song was the bane of our existence when we were teenagers. I was from Staten Island and a local group called The Elegants had a big hit with a song called “Little Star”. Every week we would check the listings and Volare was always number one with Little Star number two. After a couple months they both went down the charts together so Little Star never made it to number one.
Which song was a number one hit in the most countries worldwide? The most I can find is 'Whenever, Wherever' by Shakira which reached No.1 in 29 countries. Any improvements? link Yoursonglyrics.com
